    • Method Detail

      • hashString

        public static java.lang.String hashString(java.lang.String toHash)
        Hashes a String using the SHA-256 hash algorithm. Hashes the passed String to an array of bytes and then converts it into a string.
        Parameters:
        toHash - the String object to hash.
        Returns:
        String object, the hashed String.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed String is either empty or null.

      • convertBytesToString

        public static java.lang.String convertBytesToString(byte[] toConvert)
        Converts an array of bytes to a String.
        Parameters:
        toConvert - the bytes array to convert.
        Returns:
        String object, the converted String.

      • isHashedLength

        public static boolean isHashedLength(java.lang.String hashed)
        Compare if the given string size is equal to SHA-256 hash size.
        Parameters:
        hashed - String, the presumed hashed string.
        Returns:
        boolean, if hashed has the right size.
